sancharaka mandalaya prathiwyuhagatha kirimen pasu ehi pragathiyak daknata labe.sampradayika kalapayanwalin baharawa chinaya, indiyawa, madaperadiga kalapaye ratawalwala sancharaka karmanthaya prawardhanaya sandaha wadasatahan diyath wi thibe.

bas ekata naggama kondosthara maginta pat eka dala siya balaya pennana ape rate widhayakayata path wena kena siya balaya anisi lesa yoda ganima ahanna deyakda?ape parlimenthuwa(wyawasthadayakaya) widhayakayata yatath wi siya balaya hallu karagena rate janathatawa wasi wana andamen wiya yuthu bala thulanaya nathi kara aththe kramaye waradak nowa ee pathwana manthriwarungema waradini.udaharanayak kiyanne nam amarikawe obama kongrasayata genena panathakata siya pakshaye aya ape pakshaye janadhipathi kiyana oona ekakata atha ussanawa kiya andha lesa atha ussanne natha.
oba wadath niwaradiwa thiranaya karanawa anek kenaku ge prashnayak sambandhayen.

dumriya bhawithakarana magin sankhyawa 8% sita 12% dakwa wadikaraganima rajaye ilakkaya wi athi bawath, eesandaha suwapahasu dumriya paddhathiyak athikirime katayuthu mewanawitath aarambhakara athi bawathohu kiya.

nir aagamikayinge wardhanaya da kramikawa wardhanaya wu bawak daknata labe.2006 wana wita mema sankhyawa 19% wu athara 2016 wana wita wishala wenasak penwamin 30% dakwa ihala gos thibe.me anuwa oostreliyanu janathawagen miliyana 2.2 k kisidu aagamak adahanne nathi bawa heli daraw wi thibe
pasale di mitar 100 ye dhawana shurayaku wima, gama haraha diwime tharagayata honda pannarayak ma wiya.kolambaa rajakiya widyalayen ohu sip sathara hadariya.

eeka ranjan ramanayaka karanawa wage midiya sho ekak nemeyi.
me wapurana lada wairaya aahara kara ganna amanushyayan panasdahakata wadi pirisak ada minis lowata pamina thiyenawa

paudgalika bas karmanthaya kada watima walakwa ganimata piyawara ganima ha warjanaya sarthaka kara ganima sandaha paudgalika bas sangam deka awabodhatha giwisumak assan karamin eeye sita ekata ekwiya.sangam dekata wen wenwa katayuthu kirimen bas karmanthaya kada watimata lakwana bawin min idiriyata sangam dekama ekwa awashya piyawara ganna bawa da lanka paudgalika bas himiyange sangamaye sabhapathi gamunu wijerathna mahatha sandahan kaleya.shri langama ha paudgalika bas eekabaddha kalasatahan sadima sambandhayen adhikarana thiranayak pawa thibena bawa pawasu gamunu wijerathna mahatha eekabaddha kalasatahan kramayak thulin paudgalika bas dhawanaye athi adupadu siyayata 95 k pamana mangaharawa gatha haki bawa da wijerathna mahatha ch;wya.dhawanaya wana bas rathawalata amatharawa thawath siyayata 20 kin bas ratha wadi karanne ekthara sulu pirisakage madiya tharakara ganimata bawa stanli pranandu mahatha kiweya.samastha lanka paudgalika bas sangam sammelanaye sama sabhapathi ruban silwa, pradhana lekam anjana priyanjith yana mahathwaruda mehidi katha kalaha..
satalayit nona mona bayila gahuwath, me perahara nayisli ooganayis kole kotte naga wiharayeso bhitha maha nayakayan wahanseya.
jawipeta hoda kiyana hamapakatama 'jeppo' lebale gahanne ubalage thiyana gonkama nisa.
issara me kathawe kiyana prabath nathara wela hitiye sinharaja eka issaraha thiyena eyalage gedara.
matanam eeke etharam waradakuth na.
monawatada oba wada daksha wune...

aaya yeheliyak badu wu gathigunawalin yuktha biridak aaya swamiya samaga sama witama prithiyen inna kamathi samiya rakiyawata gos niwasa kara paminenakan pera maga balagena inna samiya niwasata pamina wita samiyage dathin allagena niwasa thulata gos ohusamaga kiri koppayaka rasa widina gaman eedina da sidu wu da pilibada katha kirimata priya karana biriyak ..

wayasa 24 sita 29 dakwa kalaya thula elesa jiwath wu ma in anathuruwa nawathath ema parisarayen aathwi nawatha wathawak paudgalika aarakshaka anshayata sambandhawa rakiyawak thora gaththe aarakshaka anshaya pilibada kohomatath mage unanduwak thibunisama pamanak nowa ee thula yam tharamak nidahas diwi pewathak gewimata yam awakashayak wana nisaweni.
charu mashumdar palamu paksha sammelanaya 1969 pawathwuwa api hathwani sammelanaya 2007 di pawathwuwa.
pissu nathnam meya harima shok ya.karage malakanda sale madde thiyan mona karannata hithuwada danne nathiya.mama ithin madhya prakashanaya di supurudu rajakariyata bassemiya.

apita iganwu mahacharyawariyak thamanta siduwu akarathabbayak wisthara karamin kiya sitiye, ekthara rogiyek ayata erehiwa nithi margayata piwisimata pawa thath karamin rohal adhikariyata paminili kara thibune, thamanwa sathkamata bhajanaya karana wita waidyathumiya boho wehesa mahansiwa sitiya bawak kiyamini.
ee gayanayen math nowunu, mohanaya nowunu tharuna sithak, ee kalayedi nothibunu tharam ya.
eeth ape hamuduruwane meka rajaya wisin gena ena panathak neweyi, meka sambuddha jayanthi karya sadhana kamituwe yojanawakata mahanayaka himiwarunge madihathwimen sakas karanaladdak neda?
pasal yana wiye keli kollanta hora rahase ahinsaka widihata pem kirimata ayithiyak naththe natha.

warthamanaya wana wita aramudale kriyakari samajikayan sankhyawa aasanna washayen miliyana 2.6k pamana wana athara eki pramanaya sewayojakayin 79,000kin aawaranaya karanu labayi. 2017 desambar 31 dina wana wita aramudale watinakama rupiyal biliyana 274 k pamana wiya. se.ni.bha.a. mandalaye katayuthu wimadhyagatha kirima pinisa saha samajikayanta wada yahapath sewawak laba denu pinisa 1995 warshayedi se.ni.bha.a. mandalaya wisin shakha jalayak handunwa dena ladi. se.ni.bha.a. panatha saha sanshodhana pradhana panatha 1980 anka 46 darana sewa niyukthayange bhara aramudal panatha (1980 okthobar masa 29 wani dina sahathika karana ladi.
